title: Lesson 1: Explore the Playground
description: Use the movement blocks to make the cat travel to all four corners of the ScratchJr stage, and use the reset button to return the cat to its starting position ...

title: Lesson 2: Playground Acrobatics
description: Learn how to use the 'Start on Green Flag' block, and see what you can do with two scripts that run simultaneously...

title: Lesson 3: Sharks and Minnows
description: Learn how to use the 'Start on Tap' block...

title: Lesson 4: Dance the Hokey Pokey
description: Record your own voice, and use the Sound, Speed, and Wait blocks...

title: Lesson 5: Play a Game of Tag
description: Learn how to use the 'Start on Bump' block...

title: Lesson 6: Monkey in the Middle
description: Use Message blocks to communicate between characters...

title: Lesson 7: Mini Golf
description: Learn how to make several scenes for one project...

title: Lesson 8: Free Choice
description: Learn how to use Paint Editor to make your own characters and backgrounds...
